description: Whether you’re climbing, riding, or trekking by foot, Roark found a need for a durable all around pant that can withstand anything we put it up against. The new Long Road features an 15” leg opening and is built from a durable T400 polyester blend featuring mechanical stretch. The oversized back pockets, and front leg cell pocket provide plenty of storage. You can count on the Long Road as your everyday wearer or partner in crime for any demands your favorite activity throws at you.
name: Roark Long Road Pants - Mens
